captions:
MRAI Expo in Jaipur, marks our first event of 2025, and we couldn’t be more excited!☀

🍃 Visit our stand to explore the best #Danieli solutions to take your business to the next level in the green and circular economy sectors.

 
🔍 Find us at Booth 1309 
📅 From January 28th to 30th
📍 Novotel Jaipur Convention Center, Jaipur, India 
 
🌐 Want to know where to find Danieli next? 
Check out our website for updates on all future events 👉 https://lnkd.in/dh8zMFDM

Dun dun duuun! The DaNews #DIM Special Issue is here and looking dapper ⭐  
Dive into the Fifth Danieli Innovaction Meeting with an in-depth focus on: 
🎯 Industry-expert panels 
⚙ Dedicated #green technology sessions 
✈ Global plant tours 
🧭 A journey through #Danieli’s history and our beautiful region 

And more!
  
Grab your definitive digital #DaNews copy here ➡ https://lnkd.in/g4D6dyc

It's our honor to announce Danieli Group as an exhibitor at FABEX Saudi Arabia 2024 

Register Now to visit and get your free ticket at: https://lnkd.in/ds5N22zB 

📅Dates: 13-16 OCTOBER 2024
📍Venue: Riyadh International Convention & Exhibition Centre (Halls 1,2,3,4,5)
🌐Website: https://www.fabxsaudi.com/
📧Email: riyadh@arabiangerman.com

♻️ Gruppo Danieli is ready to make its mark with innovative solutions for the sustainable economic development: visit our stand to take your business to the next level.

🔍 Find us at Booth 6
 📅From June 12th to 13th
